com.bwfcwalshy.easiermc.utils.nbt

Class ReflectionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bwfcwalshy.easiermc.utils.nbt.ReflectionUtil

  • public class ReflectionUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utility methods for reflection

        Throws:

        See Also:

      • getFields

        public static java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.reflect.Field> getFields(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                                                         java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.reflect.Field> predicate)
        Returns ALL fields (public -> private) of a class, filtered by the given Predicate.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The Class to get the fields for
        predicate - The Predicate to use to filter the fields
        Returns:
        The fields of the class. No ReflectionUtil.ReflectResponse, as the only error that can occur is a SecurityException.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameter is null

                                                                           java.lang.Object handle,
                                                                           java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the value of a field
        Parameters:
        field - The field to set the value for
        handle - The handle to set it for
        value - The value to set it to
        Returns:
        The result if setting it. Will just be SUCCESSFUL but not have a value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if field is null

                                                                                    java.lang.String name,
                                                                                    java.lang.Class<?>[] parameterClasses,
                                                                                    java.lang.Object... params)
        Invokes an instance method
        Parameters:
        handle - The class to get the method from
        name - The name of the method.
        parameterClasses - The classes of the parameters. Empty array for none, null is NOT permitted.
        params - The parameters of the method
        Returns:
        The result of invoking the method.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameter is null
        See Also:

      • getMethods

        public static java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.reflect.Method> getMethods(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                                                           java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.reflect.Method> predicate)
        Returns all methods (public -> private) from the class, filtered by the given predicate
        Parameters:
        clazz - The Class to get the methods from
        predicate - The predicate to use to filter
        Returns:
        All the methods in the class. No ReflectionUtil.ReflectResponse, as the only error that can occur is a SecurityException.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameter is null

      • getAllConstructors

        public static java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.reflect.Constructor<?>> getAllConstructors(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                                                                           java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.reflect.Constructor<?>> predicate)
        Returns all constructors (public -> private) from the class, filtered by the given predicate
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to get the constructors from
        predicate - The predicate to use to filter
        Returns:
        All the constructors in the class. No ReflectionUtil.ReflectResponse, as the only error that can occur is a SecurityException.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameter is null

      • getEnumConstant

        public static ReflectionUtil.ReflectResponse<java.lang.Enum<?>> getEnumConstant(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                                                                java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.Enum<?>> predicate)
        Tries to find an enum constant.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to get it from
        predicate - The predicate to filter with
        Returns:
        The found constant.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameter is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if clazz is not an enum

      • getEnumConstant

        public static ReflectionUtil.ReflectResponse<java.lang.Enum<?>> getEnumConstant(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                                                                java.lang.String name)
        Tries to find an enum constant.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to get it from
        name - The name it should match. Case sensitive.
        Returns:
        The found constant.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameter is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if 'clazz' is not an enum
